posts.post_title: Fs:  T3 John McGraw Raw Checklist Back (PRICE DROP)
posts.post_content:
I have a T3 John McGraw for sale. 

It's raw and presents well but it wouldn't get more than a 1 if graded.  There is a crease in the top left corner and staining.

Asking [STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] $450 delivered.
Payment by PayPal please.
